question:
Which of the following statements are correct about Lead?
1. Petrol, diesel, lead batteries, paints and hair dye products contain Lead.
2. Lead particularly affects children.
3. It can cause damage to the nervous system and create digestive problems and, in some cases, cause cancer.
Select the correct option from the codes given below:
explanation: Petrol, diesel, lead batteries, paints and hair dye products contain Lead. Lead particularly affects children. It can cause damage to the nervous system and create digestive problems and, in some cases, cause cancer.
